GK19kmeghvpu:0: kaś cit kāntāvirahaguruṇā svādhikārapramattaḥ śāpenāstaṅgamitamahimā varṣabhogyeṇa bhartuḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:1: yakṣaś cakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu snigdhacchāyātaruṣu vasatiṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣu // KMdV_1 //
GK19kmeghvpu:2: tasminn adrau kati cid abalāviprayuktaḥ sa kāmī nītvā māsān kanakavalayabhraṃśariktaprakoṣṭhaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:3: āṣāḍhasya praśamadivase megham āśliṣṭasānuṃ vaprakrīḍāpariṇatagajaprekṣaṇīyaṃ dadarśa // KMdV_2 //
GK19kmeghvpu:4: tasya sthitvā katham api puraḥ ketakādhānahetor antarbāṣpaś ciram anucaro rājarājasya dadhyau /
GK19kmeghvpu:5: meghāloke bhavati sukhino 'py anyathāvṛtti cetaḥ kaṇṭhāśleṣapraṇayini jane kiṃ punar dūrasaṃsthe // KMdV_3 //
GK19kmeghvpu:6: pratyāsanne nabhasi dayitājīvitālambanārthī jīmūtena svakuśalamayīṃ hārayiṣyan pravṛttim /
GK19kmeghvpu:7: sa pratyagraiḥ kuṭajakusumaiḥ kalpitārghāya tasmai prītaḥ prītipramukhavacanaṃ svāgataṃ vyājahāra // KMdV_4 //
GK19kmeghvpu:8: dhūmajyotiḥsalilamarutāṃ saṃnipātaḥ kva meghaḥ saṃdeśārthāḥ kva paṭukaraṇaiḥ prāṇibhiḥ prāpaṇīyāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:9: ity autsukyād aparigaṇayan guhyakas taṃ yayāce kāmārtā hi praṇayakṛpaṇāś cetanācetaneṣu // KMdV_5 //
GK19kmeghvpu:10: jātaṃ vaṃśe bhuvanavidite puṣkarāvartakānāṃ jānāmi tvāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaṃ kāmarūpaṃ maghonaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:11: tenārthitvaṃ tvayi vidhivaśād dūrabandhur gato 'haṃ yācñā vandhyā varam adhiguṇe nādhame labdhakāmā // KMdV_6 //
GK19kmeghvpu:12: saṃtaptānāṃ tvam asi śaraṇaṃ tat payoda priyāyāḥ saṃdeśaṃ me hara dhanapatikrodhaviśleṣitasya /
GK19kmeghvpu:13: gantavyā te vasatir alakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ bāhyodyānasthitaharaśiraścandrikādhautaharmyā // KMdV_7 //
GK19kmeghvpu:14: tvām ārūḍhaṃ pavanapadavīm udgṛhītālakāntāḥ prekṣiṣyante pathikavanitāḥ pratyayād āśvasantyaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:15: kaḥ saṃnaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyāṃ na syād anyo 'py aham iva jano yaḥ parādhīnavṛttiḥ // KMdV_8 //
GK19kmeghvpu:16: āpṛcchasva priyasakham amuṃ tuṅgam āliṅgya śailaṃ vandyaiḥ puṃsāṃ raghupatipadair aṅkitaṃ mekhalāsu /
GK19kmeghvpu:17: kāle kāle bhavati bhavatā yasya saṃyogam etya snehavyaktiś ciravirahajaṃ muñcato bāṣpam uṣṇam // KMdV_9 //
GK19kmeghvpu:18: mandaṃ mandaṃ nudati pavanaś cānukūlo yathā tvāṃ vāmaś cāyaṃ nadati madhuraṃ cātakas toyagṛdhnuḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:19: garbhādhānasthiraparicayā nūnam ābaddhamālāḥ seviṣyante nayanasubhagaṃ khe bhavantaṃ balākāḥ // KMdV_10 //
GK19kmeghvpu:20: tāṃ cāvaśyaṃ divasagaṇanātatparām ekapatnīm avyāpannām avihatagatir drakṣyasi bhrātṛjāyām /
GK19kmeghvpu:21: āśābandhaḥ kusumasadṛśaṃ prāyaśo hy aṅganānāṃ sadyaḥpātapraṇayi hṛdayaṃ viprayoge ruṇaddhi // KMdV_11 //
GK19kmeghvpu:22: kartuṃ yac ca prabhavati mahīm ucchilindhrām avandhyaṃ tac chrutvā te śravaṇasubhagaṃ garjitaṃ mānasotkāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:23: ā kailāsād bisakisalayacchedapātheyavantaḥ saṃpatsyante nabhasi bhavato rājahaṃsāḥ sahāyāḥ // KMdV_12 //
GK19kmeghvpu:24: mārgaṃ tāvac chṛṇu kathayatas tvatprayāṇānukūlaṃ saṃdeśaṃ me tadanu jalada śroṣyasi śrotrapeyam /
GK19kmeghvpu:25: khinnaḥ khinnaḥ śikhariṣu padaṃ nyasya gantāsi yatra kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ parilaghu payaḥ srotasāṃ copabhujya // KMdV_13 //
GK19kmeghvpu:26: adreḥ śṛṅgaṃ harati pavanaḥ kiṃ svid ity unmukhībhir dṛṣṭotsāhaś cakitacakitaṃ mugdhasiddhāṅganābhiḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:27: sthānād asmāt sarasaniculād utpatodaṅmukhaḥ khaṃ diṅnāgānāṃ pathi pariharan sthūlahastāvalehān // KMdV_14 //
GK19kmeghvpu:28: ratnacchāyāvyatikara iva prekṣyam etat purastād valmīkāgrāt prabhavati dhanuṣkhaṇḍam ākhaṇḍalasya /
GK19kmeghvpu:29: yena śyāmaṃ vapur atitarāṃ kāntim āpatsyate te barheṇeva sphuritarucinā gopaveśasya viṣṇoḥ // KMdV_15 //
GK19kmeghvpu:30: tvayy āyattaṃ kṛṣiphalam iti bhrūvilāsānabhijñaiḥ prītisnigdhair janapadavadhūlocanaiḥ pīyamānaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:31: sadyaḥsīrotkaṣaṇasurabhi kṣetram āruhya mālaṃ kiṃ cit paścād pravalaya gatiṃ bhūya evottareṇa // KMdV_16 //
GK19kmeghvpu:32: tvām āsārapraśamitavanopaplavaṃ sādhu mūrdhnā vakṣyaty adhvaśramaparigataṃ sānumān āmrakūṭaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:33: na kṣudro 'pi prathamasukṛtāpekṣayā saṃśrayāya prāpte mitre bhavati vimukhaḥ kiṃ punar yas tathoccaiḥ // KMdV_17 //
GK19kmeghvpu:34: channopāntaḥ pariṇataphaladyotibhiḥ kānanāmrais tvayy ārūḍhe śikharam acalaḥ snigdhaveṇīsavarṇe /
GK19kmeghvpu:35: nūnaṃ yāsyaty amaramithunaprekṣaṇīyām avasthāṃ madhye śyāmaḥ stana iva bhuvaḥ śeṣavistārapāṇḍuḥ // KMdV_18 //
GK19kmeghvpu:36: sthitvā tasmin vanacaravadhūbhuktakuñje muhūrtaṃ toyotsargadrutataragatis tatparaṃ vartma tīrṇaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:37: revāṃ drakṣyasy upalaviṣame vindhyapāde viśīrṇāṃ bhakticchedair iva viracitāṃ bhūtim aṅge gajasya // KMdV_19 //
GK19kmeghvpu:38: tasyās tiktair vanagajamadair vāsitaṃ vāntavṛṣṭir jambūṣaṇḍapratihatarayaṃ toyam ādāya gaccheḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:39: antaḥsāraṃ ghana tulayituṃ nānilaḥ śakṣyati tvāṃ riktaḥ sarvo bhavati hi laghuḥ pūrṇatā gauravāya // KMdV_20 //
GK19kmeghvpu:40: nīpaṃ dṛṣṭvā haritakapiśaṃ kesarair ardharūḍhair āvirbhūtaprathamamukulāḥ kandalīś cānukaccham /
GK19kmeghvpu:41: dagdhāraṇyeṣv adhikasurabhiṃ gandham āghrāya corvyāḥ sāraṅgās te jalalavamucaḥ sūcayiṣyanti mārgam // KMdV_21 //
GK19kmeghvpu:42: utpaśyāmi drutam api sakhe matpriyārthaṃ yiyāsoḥ kālakṣepaṃ kakubhasurabhau parvate parvate te /
GK19kmeghvpu:43: śuklāpāṅgaiḥ sanayanajalaiḥ svāgatīkṛtya kekāḥ pratyudyātaḥ katham api bhavān gantum āśu vyavasyet // KMdV_22 //
GK19kmeghvpu:44: pāṇḍucchāyopavanavṛtayaḥ ketakaiḥ sūcibhinnair nīḍārambhair gṛhabalibhujām ākulagrāmacaityāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:45: tvayy āsanne phalapariṇatiśyāmajambūvanāntāḥ saṃpatsyante katipayadinasthāyihaṃsā daśārṇāḥ // KMdV_23 //
GK19kmeghvpu:46: teṣāṃ dikṣu prathitavidiśālakṣaṇāṃ rājadhānīṃ gatvā sadyaḥ phalam avikalaṃ kāmukatvasya labdhā /
GK19kmeghvpu:47: tīropāntastanitasubhagaṃ pāsyasi svādu yat tat sabhrūbhaṅgaṃ mukham iva payo vetravatyāś calormi // KMdV_24 //
GK19kmeghvpu:48: nīcairākhyaṃ girim adhivases tatra viśrāmahetos tvatsamparkāt pulakitam iva prauḍhapuṣpaiḥ kadambaiḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:49: yaḥ paṇyastrīratiparimalodgāribhir nāgarāṇām uddāmāni prathayati śilāveśmabhir yauvanāni // KMdV_25 //
GK19kmeghvpu:50: viśrāntaḥ san vraja vananadītīrajātāni siñcann udyānānāṃ navajalakaṇair yūthikājālakāni /
GK19kmeghvpu:52: vakraḥ panthā yad api bhavataḥ prasthitasyottarāśāṃ saudhotsaṅgapraṇayavimukho mā sma bhūr ujjayinyāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:53: vidyuddāmasphuritacakitais tatra paurāṅganānāṃ lolāpāṅgair yadi na ramase locanair vañcito 'si // KMdV_27 //
GK19kmeghvpu:55: nirvindhyāyāḥ pathi bhava rasābhyantaraḥ saṃnipatya strīṇām ādyaṃ praṇayavacanaṃ vibhramo hi priyeṣu // KMdV_28 //
GK19kmeghvpu:56: veṇībhūtapratanusalilāṃ tām atītasya sindhuṃ pāṇḍucchāyāṃ taṭaruhatarubhraṃśibhir jīrṇaparṇaiḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:57: saubhāgyaṃ te subhaga virahāvasthayā vyañjayantīṃ kārśyaṃ yena tyajati vidhinā sa tvayaivopapādyaḥ // KMdV_29 //
GK19kmeghvpu:58: prāpyāvantīn udayanakathākovidagrāmavṛddhān pūrvoddiṣṭām anusara purīṃ śrīviśālāṃ viśālām /
GK19kmeghvpu:59: svalpībhūte sucaritaphale svargiṇāṃ gāṃ gatānāṃ śeṣaiḥ puṇyair hṛtam iva divaḥ kāntimat khaṇḍam ekam // KMdV_30 //
GK19kmeghvpu:60: dīrghīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ pratyūṣeṣu sphuṭitakamalāmodamaitrīkaṣāyaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:61: yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānim aṅgānukūlaḥ siprāvātaḥ priyatama iva prārthanācāṭukāraḥ // KMdV_31 //
GK19kmeghvpu:62: jālodgīrṇair upacitavapuḥ keśasaṃskāradhūmair bandhuprītyā bhavanaśikhibhir dattanṛttopahāraḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:63: harmyeṣv asyāḥ kusumasurabhiṣv adhvakhinnāntarātmā nītvā rātriṃ lalitavanitāpādarāgāṅkiteṣu // KMdV_32 //
GK19kmeghvpu:64: bhartuḥ kaṇṭhacchavir iti gaṇaiḥ sādaraṃ dṛśyamāṇaḥ puṇyaṃ yāyās tribhuvanaguror dhāma caṇḍeśvarasya /
GK19kmeghvpu:65: dhūtodyānaṃ kuvalayarajogandhibhir gandhavatyās toyakrīḍāniratayuvatisnānatiktair marudbhiḥ // KMdV_33 //
GK19kmeghvpu:66: apy anyasmiñ jaladhara mahākālam āsādya kāle sthātavyaṃ te nayanaviṣayaṃ yāvad abhyeti bhānuḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:67: kurvan saṃdhyābalipaṭahatāṃ śūlinaḥ ślāghanīyām āmandrāṇāṃ phalam avikalaṃ lapsyase garjitānām // KMdV_34 //
GK19kmeghvpu:68: pādanyāsakvaṇitaraśanās tatra līlāvadhūtai ratnacchāyākhacitavalibhiś cāmaraiḥ klāntahastāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:69: veśyās tvatto nakhapadasukhān prāpya varṣāgrabindūn āmokṣyanti tvayi madhukaraśreṇidīrghān kaṭākṣān // KMdV_35 //
GK19kmeghvpu:70: paścād uccairbhujataruvanaṃ maṇḍalenābhilīnaḥ sāṃdhyaṃ tejaḥ pratinavajapāpuṣparaktaṃ dadhānaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:71: nṛttārambhe hara paśupater ārdranāgājinecchāṃ śāntodvegastimitanayanaṃ dṛṣṭabhaktir bhavānyā // KMdV_36 //
GK19kmeghvpu:72: gacchantīnāṃ ramaṇavasatiṃ yoṣitāṃ tatra naktaṃ ruddhāloke narapatipathe sūcibhedyais tamobhiḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:73: saudāminyā kanakanikaṣasnigdhayā darśayorvīṃ toyotsargastanitamukharo mā sma bhūr viklavās tāḥ // KMdV_37 //
GK19kmeghvpu:74: tāṃ kasyāṃ cid bhavanavalabhau suptapārāvatāyāṃ nītvā rātriṃ ciravilasanāt khinnavidyutkalatraḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:75: dṛṣṭe sūrye punar api bhavān vāhayed adhvaśeṣaṃ mandāyante na khalu suhṛdām abhyupetārthakṛtyāḥ // KMdV_38 //
GK19kmeghvpu:76: tasmin kāle nayanasalilaṃ yoṣitāṃ khaṇḍitānāṃ śāntiṃ neyaṃ praṇayibhir ato vartma bhānos tyajāśu /
GK19kmeghvpu:77: prāleyāsraṃ kamalavadanāt so 'pi hartuṃ nalinyāḥ pratyāvṛttas tvayi kararudhi syād analpābhyasūyaḥ // KMdV_39 //
GK19kmeghvpu:78: gambhīrāyāḥ payasi saritaś cetasīva prasanne chāyātmāpi prakṛtisubhago lapsyate te praveśam /
GK19kmeghvpu:79: tasmāt tasyāḥ kumudaviśadāny arhasi tvaṃ na dhairyān moghīkartuṃ caṭulaśapharodvartanaprekṣitāni // KMdV_40 //
GK19kmeghvpu:80: tasyāḥ kiṃ cit karadhṛtam iva prāptavānīraśākhaṃ hṛtvā nīlaṃ salilavasanaṃ muktarodhonitambam /
GK19kmeghvpu:81: prasthānaṃ te katham api sakhe lambamānasya bhāvi jñātāsvādaḥ pulinajaghanāṃ ko vihātuṃ samarthaḥ // KMdV_41 //
GK19kmeghvpu:83: nīcair vāsyaty upajigamiṣor devapūrvaṃ giriṃ te śīto vāyuḥ pariṇamayitā kānanodumbarāṇām // KMdV_42 //
GK19kmeghvpu:84: tatra skandaṃ niyatavasatiṃ puṣpameghīkṛtātmā puṣpāsāraiḥ snapayatu bhavān vyomagaṅgājalārdraiḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:85: rakṣāhetor navaśaśibhṛtā vāsavīnāṃ camūnām atyādityaṃ hutavahamukhe saṃbhṛtaṃ tadd hi tejaḥ // KMdV_43 //
GK19kmeghvpu:86: jyotirlekhāvalayi galitaṃ yasya barhaṃ bhavānī putraprītyā kuvalayapadaprāpi karṇe karoti /
GK19kmeghvpu:87: dhautāpāṅgaṃ haraśaśirucā pāvakes taṃ mayūraṃ paścād adrigrahaṇagurubhir garjitair nartayethāḥ // KMdV_44 //
GK19kmeghvpu:88: ārādhyaivaṃ śaravaṇabhuvaṃ devam ullaṅghitādhvā siddhadvandvair jalakaṇabhayād vīṇibhir muktamārgaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:89: vyālambethāḥ surabhitanayālambhajāṃ mānayiṣyan srotomūrtyā bhuvi pariṇatāṃ rantidevasya kīrtim // KMdV_45 //
GK19kmeghvpu:90: tvayy ādātuṃ jalam avanate śārṅgiṇo varṇacaure tasyāḥ sindhoḥ pṛthum api tanuṃ dūrabhāvāt pravāham /
GK19kmeghvpu:91: prekṣiṣyante gaganagatayo dūram āvarjya dṛṣṭīr ekaṃ muktāguṇam iva bhuvaḥ sthūlamadhyendranīlam // KMdV_46 //
GK19kmeghvpu:92: tām uttīrya vraja paricitabhrūlatāvibhramāṇāṃ pakṣmotkṣepād uparivilasatkṛṣṇaśāraprabhāṇām /
GK19kmeghvpu:94: brahmāvartaṃ janapadam adhaśchāyayā gāhamānaḥ kṣetraṃ kṣatrapradhanapiśunaṃ kauravaṃ tad bhajethāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:95: rājanyānāṃ śitaśaraśatair yatra gāṇḍīvadhanvā dhārāpātais tvam iva kamalāny abhyavarṣan mukhāni // KMdV_48 //
GK19kmeghvpu:96: hitvā hālām abhimatarasāṃ revatīlocanāṅkāṃ bandhuprītyā samaravimukho lāṅgalī yāḥ siṣeve /
GK19kmeghvpu:97: kṛtvā tāsām abhigamam apāṃ somya sārasvatīnām antaḥsvacchas tvam api bhavitā varṇamātreṇa kṛṣṇaḥ // KMdV_49 //
GK19kmeghvpu:98: tasmād gaccher anukanakhalaṃ śailarājāvatīrṇāṃ jahnoḥ kanyāṃ sagaratanayasvargasopānapaṅktim /
GK19kmeghvpu:99: gaurīvaktrabhrukuṭiracanāṃ yā vihasyeva phenaiḥ śambhoḥ keśagrahaṇam akarod indulagnormihastā // KMdV_50 //
GK19kmeghvpu:100: tasyāḥ pātuṃ suragaja iva vyomni pūrvārdhalambī tvaṃ ced acchasphaṭikaviśadaṃ tarkayes tiryag ambhaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:101: saṃsarpantyā sapadi bhavataḥ srotasi cchāyayā sā syād asthānopanatayamunāsaṃgam evābhirāmā // KMdV_51 //
GK19kmeghvpu:102: āsīnānāṃ surabhitaśilaṃ nābhigandhair mṛgāṇāṃ tasyā eva prabhavam acalaṃ prāpya gauraṃ tuṣāraiḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:103: vakṣyasy adhvaśramavinayane tasya śṛṅge niṣaṇṇaḥ śobhāṃ ramyāṃ trinayanavṛṣotkhātapaṅkopameyām // KMdV_52 //
GK19kmeghvpu:104: taṃ ced vāyau sarati saralaskandhasaṃghaṭṭajanmā bādhetolkākṣapitacamarīvālabhāro davāgniḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:105: arhasy enaṃ śamayitum alaṃ vāridhārāsahasrair āpannārtipraśamanaphalāḥ saṃpado hy uttamānām // KMdV_53 //
GK19kmeghvpu:106: ye tvāṃ muktadhvanim asahanāḥ kāyabhaṅgāya tasmin darpotsekād upari śarabhā laṅghayiṣyanty alaṅghyam /
GK19kmeghvpu:107: tān kurvīthās tumulakarakāvṛṣṭihāsāvakīrṇān ke vā na syuḥ paribhavapadaṃ niṣphalārambhayatnāḥ // KMdV_54 //
GK19kmeghvpu:108: tatra vyaktaṃ dṛṣadi caraṇanyāsam ardhendumauleḥ śaśvat siddhair upahṛtabaliṃ bhaktinamraḥ parīyāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:109: yasmin dṛṣṭe karaṇavigamād ūrdhvam uddhūtapāpāḥ kalpante 'sya sthiragaṇapadaprāptaye śraddadhānāḥ // KMdV_55 //
GK19kmeghvpu:110: śabdāyante madhuram anilaiḥ kīcakāḥ pūryamāṇāḥ saṃraktābhis tripuravijayo gīyate kiṃnarībhiḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:111: nirhrādī te muraja iva cet kandarāsu dhvaniḥ syāt saṃgītārtho nanu paśupates tatra bhāvī samastaḥ // KMdV_56 //
GK19kmeghvpu:112: prāleyādrer upataṭam atikramya tāṃs tān viśeṣān haṃsadvāraṃ bhṛgupatiyaśovartma yat krauñcarandhram /
GK19kmeghvpu:113: tenodīcīṃ diśam abhisares tiryagāyāmaśobhī śyāmaḥ pādo baliniyamanābhyudyatasyeva viṣṇoḥ // KMdV_57 //
GK19kmeghvpu:114: gatvā cordhvaṃ daśamukhabhujocchvāsitaprasthasaṃdheḥ kailāsasya tridaśavanitādarpaṇasyātithiḥ syāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:115: śṛṅgocchrāyaiḥ kumudaviśadair yo vitatya sthitaḥ khaṃ rāśībhūtaḥ pratiniśam iva tryambakasyāṭṭahāsaḥ // KMdV_58 //
GK19kmeghvpu:116: utpaśyāmi tvayi taṭagate snigdhabhinnāñjanābhe sadyaḥkṛttadviradadaśanacchedagaurasya tasya /
GK19kmeghvpu:117: līlām adreḥ stimitanayanaprekṣaṇīyāṃ bhavitrīm aṃsanyaste sati halabhṛto mecake vāsasīva // KMdV_59 //
GK19kmeghvpu:118: hitvā nīlaṃ bhujagavalayaṃ śambhunā dattahastā krīḍāśaile yadi ca viharet pādacāreṇa gaurī /
GK19kmeghvpu:119: bhaṅgībhaktyā viracitavapuḥ stambhitāntarjalo 'syāḥ sopānatvaṃ kuru sukhapadasparśam ārohaṇeṣu // KMdV_60 //
GK19kmeghvpu:120: tatrāvaśyaṃ janitasalilodgāram antaḥpraveśān neṣyanti tvāṃ surayuvatayo yantradhārāgṛhatvam /
GK19kmeghvpu:121: tābhyo mokṣas tava yadi sakhe gharmalabdhasya na syāt krīḍālolāḥ śravaṇaparuṣair garjitair bhāyayes tāḥ // KMdV_61 //
GK19kmeghvpu:122: hemāmbhojaprasavi salilaṃ mānasasyādadānaḥ kurvan kāmāt kṣaṇamukhapaṭaprītim airāvaṇasya /
GK19kmeghvpu:123: dhunvan vātaiḥ sajalapṛṣataiḥ kalpavṛkṣāṃśukāni cchāyābhinnaḥ sphaṭikaviśadaṃ nirviśeḥ paravataṃ tam // KMdV_62 //
GK19kmeghvpu:124: tasyotsaṅge praṇayina iva srastagaṅgādugūlāṃ na tvaṃ dṛṣṭvā na punar alakāṃ jñāsyase kāmacārin /
GK19kmeghvpu:125: yā vaḥ kāle vahati salilodgāram uccairvimānā muktājālagrathitam alakaṃ kāminīvābhravṛndam // KMdV_63 //
GK19kmeghvpu:126: vidyutvantaṃ lalitavanitāḥ sendracāpaṃ sacitrāḥ saṃgītāya prahatamurajāḥ snigdhagambhīraghoṣam /
GK19kmeghvpu:127: antastoyaṃ maṇimayabhuvas tuṅgam abhraṃlihāgrāḥ prāsādās tvāṃ tulayitum alaṃ yatra tais tair viśeṣaiḥ // KMdV_64 //
GK19kmeghvpu:128: haste līlākamalam alakaṃ bālakundānuviddhaṃ nītā rodhraprasavarajasā pāṇḍutām ānanaśrīḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:129: cūḍāpāśe navakuravakaṃ cāru karṇe śirīṣaṃ sīmante ca tvadupagamajaṃ yatra nīpaṃ vadhūnām // KMdV_65 //
GK19kmeghvpu:130: yasyāṃ yakṣāḥ sitamaṇimayāny etya harmyasthalāni jyotiśchāyākusumaracanāny uttamastrīsahāyāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:131: āsevante madhu ratiphalaṃ kalpavṛkṣaprasūtaṃ tvadgambhīradhvaniṣu śanakaiḥ puṣkareṣv āhateṣu // KMdV_66 //
GK19kmeghvpu:132: yatra strīṇāṃ priyatamabhujāliṅganocchvāsitānām aṅgaglāniṃ suratajanitāṃ tantujālāvalambāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:133: tvatsaṃrodhāpagamaviśadaiś cotitāś candrapādair vyālumpanti sphuṭajalalavasyandinaś candrakāntāḥ // KMdV_67 //
GK19kmeghvpu:134: netrā nītāḥ satatagatinā yad vimānāgrabhūmīr ālekhyānāṃ navajalakaṇair doṣam utpādya sadyaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:135: śaṅkāspṛṣṭā iva jalamucas tvādṛśā yatra jālair dhūmodgārānukṛtinipuṇaṃ jarjarā niṣpatanti // KMdV_68 //
GK19kmeghvpu:136: nīvībandhocchvasanaśithilaṃ yatra yakṣāṅganānāṃ vāsaḥ kāmād anibhṛtakareṣv ākṣipatsu priyeṣu /
GK19kmeghvpu:137: arcistuṅgān abhimukham api prāpya ratnapradīpān hrīmūḍhānāṃ bhavati viphalapreraṇaś cūrṇamuṣṭiḥ // KMdV_69 //
GK19kmeghvpu:138: gatyutkampād alakapatitair yatra mandārapuṣpaiḥ kḷptacchedyaiḥ kanakakamalaiḥ karṇavibhraṃśibhiś ca /
GK19kmeghvpu:139: muktālagnastanaparimalaiś chinnasūtraiś ca hārair naiśo mārgaḥ savitur udaye sūcyate kāminīnām // KMdV_70 //
GK19kmeghvpu:140: matvā devaṃ dhanapatisakhaṃ yatra sākṣād vasantaṃ prāyaś cāpaṃ na vahati bhayān manmathaḥ ṣaṭpadajyam /
GK19kmeghvpu:141: sabhrūbhaṅgaprahitanayanaiḥ kāmilakṣyeṣv amoghais tasyārambhaś caturavanitāvibhramair eva siddhaḥ // KMdV_71 //
GK19kmeghvpu:142: tatrāgāraṃ dhanapatigṛhān uttareṇāsmadīyaṃ dūrāl lakṣyaṃ tad amaradhanuś cāruṇā toraṇena /
GK19kmeghvpu:143: yasyopānte kṛtakatanayaḥ kāntayā vardhito me hastaprāpyastavakanamito bālamandāravṛkṣaḥ // KMdV_72 //
GK19kmeghvpu:144: vāpī cāsmin marakataśilābaddhasopānamārgā haimaiḥ syūtā kamalamukulaiḥ snigdhavaiḍūryanālaiḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:145: yasyās toye kṛtavasatayo mānasaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ na dhyāsyanti vyapagataśucas tvām api prekṣya haṃsāḥ // KMdV_73 //
GK19kmeghvpu:146: yasyās tīre nicitaśikharaḥ peśalair indranīlaiḥ krīḍāśailaḥ kanakakadalīveṣṭanaprekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:147: madgehinyāḥ priya iti sakhe cetasā kātareṇa prekṣyopāntasphuritataḍitaṃ tvāṃ tam eva smarāmi // KMdV_74 //
GK19kmeghvpu:148: raktāśokaś calakisalayaḥ kesaraś cātra kāntaḥ pratyāsannau kuravakavṛter mādhavīmaṇḍapasya /
GK19kmeghvpu:149: ekaḥ sakhyās tava saha mayā vāmapādābhilāṣī kāṅkṣaty anyo vadanamadirāṃ dohadacchadmanāsyāḥ // KMdV_75 //
GK19kmeghvpu:150: tanmadhye ca sphaṭikaphalakā kāñcanī vāsayaṣṭir mūle naddhā maṇibhir anatiprauḍhavaṃśaprakāśaiḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:151: tālaiḥ śiñjadvalayasubhagair nartitaḥ kāntayā me yām adhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛd vaḥ // KMdV_76 //
GK19kmeghvpu:152: ebhiḥ sādho hṛdayanihitair lakṣaṇair lakṣaṇīyaṃ dvāropānte likhitavapuṣau śaṅkhapadmau ca dṛṣṭvā /
GK19kmeghvpu:153: kṣāmacchāyaṃ bhavanam adhunā madviyogena nūnaṃ sūryāpāye na khalu kamalaṃ puṣyati svām abhikhyām // KMdV_77 //
GK19kmeghvpu:154: gatvā sadyaḥ kalabhatanutāṃ śīghrasaṃpātahetoḥ krīḍāśaile prathamakathite ramyasānau niṣaṇṇaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:155: arhasy antarbhavanapatitāṃ kartum alpālpabhāsaṃ khadyotālīvilasitanibhāṃ vidyudunmeṣadṛṣṭim // KMdV_78 //
GK19kmeghvpu:156: tanvī śyāmā śikharadaśanā pakvabimbādharauṣṭhī madhye kṣāmā cakitahariṇaprekṣaṇī nimnanābhiḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:157: śroṇībhārād alasagamanā stokanamrā stanābhyāṃ yā tatra syād yuvativiṣaye sṛṣṭir ādyeva dhātuḥ // KMdV_79 //
GK19kmeghvpu:158: tāṃ jānīyāḥ parimitakathāṃ jīvitaṃ me dvitīyaṃ dūrībhūte mayi sahacare cakravākīm ivaikām /
GK19kmeghvpu:159: gāḍhotkaṇṭhāguruṣu divaseṣv eṣu gacchatsu bālāṃ jātāṃ manye śiśiramathitāṃ padminīṃ vānyarūpām // KMdV_80 //
GK19kmeghvpu:160: nūnaṃ tasyāḥ prabalaruditocchūnanetraṃ bahūnāṃ niḥśvāsānām aśiśiratayā bhinnavarṇādharauṣṭham /
GK19kmeghvpu:161: hastanyastaṃ mukham asakalavyakti lambālakatvād indor dainyaṃ tvadupasaraṇakliṣṭakānter bibharti // KMdV_81 //
GK19kmeghvpu:162: āloke te nipatati purā sā balivyākulā vā matsādṛśyaṃ virahatanu vā bhāvagamyaṃ likhantī /
GK19kmeghvpu:163: pṛcchantī vā madhuravacanāṃ śārikāṃ pañjarasthāṃ kac cid bhartuḥ smarasi nibhṛte tvaṃ hi tasya priyeti // KMdV_82 //
GK19kmeghvpu:164: utsaṅge vā malinavasane somya nikṣipya vīṇāṃ madgotrāṅkaṃ viracitapadaṃ geyam udgātukāmā /
GK19kmeghvpu:165: tantrīr ārdrā nayanasalilaiḥ sārayitvā kathaṃ cid bhūyo bhūyaḥ svayam api kṛtāṃ mūrcchanāṃ vismarantī // KMdV_83 //
GK19kmeghvpu:166: śeṣān māsān gamanadivasaprastutasyāvadher vā vinyasyantī bhuvi gaṇanayā dehalīdattapuṣpaiḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:167: saṃyogaṃ vā hṛdayanihitārambham āsvādayantī prāyeṇaite ramaṇaviraheṣv aṅganānāṃ vinodāḥ // KMdV_84 //
GK19kmeghvpu:168: ādye baddhā virahadivase yā śikhā dāma hitvā śāpasyānte vigalitaśucā yā mayonmocanīyā /
GK19kmeghvpu:169: sparśakliṣṭām ayamitanakhenāsakṛt sārayantīṃ gaṇḍābhogāt kaṭhinaviṣamād ekaveṇīṃ kareṇa // KMdV_85 //
GK19kmeghvpu:170: savyāpārām ahani na tathā khedayed viprayogaḥ śaṅke rātrau gurutaraśucaṃ nirvinodāṃ sakhīṃ te /
GK19kmeghvpu:171: matsaṃdeśaiḥ sukhayitum ataḥ paśya sādhvīṃ niśīthe tām unnidrām avaniśayanāsannavātāyanasthaḥ // KMdV_86 //
GK19kmeghvpu:172: ādhikṣāmāṃ virahaśayane saṃnikīrṇaikapārśvāṃ prācīmūle tanum iva kalāmātraśeṣāṃ himāṃśoḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:173: matsaṃyogaḥ katham upanamet svapnajo 'pīti nidrām ākāṅkṣantīṃ nayanasalilotpīḍaruddhāvakāśām // KMdV_87 //
GK19kmeghvpu:174: niḥśvāsenādharakisalayakleśinā vikṣipantīṃ śuddhasnānāt paruṣamalakaṃ nūnam āgaṇḍalambam /
GK19kmeghvpu:175: nītā rātriḥ kṣaṇa iva mayā sārdham icchāratair yā tām evoṣṇair virahaśayaneṣv asrubhir yāpayantīm // KMdV_88 //
GK19kmeghvpu:176: pādān indor amṛtaśiśirāñjālamārgapraviṣṭān pūrvaprītyā gatam abhimukhaṃ saṃnivṛttaṃ tathaiva /
GK19kmeghvpu:177: cakṣuḥ khedāt sajalagurubhiḥ pakṣmabhiś chādayantīṃ sābhre 'hnīva sthalakamalinīṃ na prabuddhāṃ na suptām // KMdV_89 //
GK19kmeghvpu:178: jāne sakhyās tava mayi manaḥ saṃbhṛtasneham asmād itthaṃbhūtāṃ prathamavirahe tām ahaṃ tarkayāmi /
GK19kmeghvpu:179: vācālaṃ māṃ na khalu subhagaṃmanyabhāvaḥ karoti pratyakṣaṃ te nikhilam acirād bhrātar uktaṃ mayā yat // KMdV_90 //
GK19kmeghvpu:180: sā saṃnyastābharaṇam abalā pelavaṃ dhārayantī śayyotsaṅge nihitam asakṛd duḥkhaduḥkhena gātram /
GK19kmeghvpu:181: tvām apy asraṃ navajalamayaṃ mocayiṣyaty avaśyaṃ prāyaḥ sarvo bhavati karuṇāvṛttir ārdrāntarātmā // KMdV_91 //
GK19kmeghvpu:182: ruddhāpāṅgaprasaram alakair añjanasnehaśūnyaṃ pratyādeśād api ca madhuno vismṛtabhrūvilāsam /
GK19kmeghvpu:183: tvayy āsanne nayanam uparispandi śaṅke mṛgākṣyā mīnakṣobhākulakuvalayaśrītulām eṣyatīti // KMdV_92 //
GK19kmeghvpu:184: vāmo vāsyāḥ kararuhapadair mucyamāno madīyair muktājālaṃ ciraparicitaṃ tyājito daivagatyā /
GK19kmeghvpu:185: saṃbhogānte mama samucito hastasaṃvāhanānāṃ yāsyaty ūruḥ sarasakadalīstambhagauraś calatvam // KMdV_93 //
GK19kmeghvpu:186: tasmin kāle jalada dayitā labdhanidrā yadi syād anvāsyaināṃ stanitavimukho yāmamātraṃ sahasva /
GK19kmeghvpu:187: mā bhūd asyāḥ praṇayini mayi svapnalabdhe kathaṃ cit sadyaḥ kaṇṭhacyutabhujalatāgranthi gāḍhopagūḍham // KMdV_94 //
GK19kmeghvpu:188: tām utthāpya svajalakaṇikāśītalenānilena pratyāśvastāṃ samam abhinavair jālakair mālatīnām /
GK19kmeghvpu:189: vidyudgarbhe nihitanayanāṃ tvatsanāthe gavākṣe vaktuṃ dhīrastanitavacanair māninīṃ prakramethāḥ // KMdV_95 //
GK19kmeghvpu:190: bhartur mitraṃ priyam avidhave viddhi mām ambuvāhaṃ tatsaṃdeśān manasi nihitād āgataṃ tvatsamīpam /
GK19kmeghvpu:191: yo vṛndāni tvarayati pathi śrāmyatāṃ proṣitānāṃ mandrasnigdhair dhvanibhir abalāveṇimokṣotsukāni // KMdV_96 //
GK19kmeghvpu:192: ity ākhyāte pavanatanayaṃ maithilīvonmukhī sā tvām utkaṇṭhocchvasitahṛdayā vīkṣya saṃbhāvya caiva /
GK19kmeghvpu:193: śroṣyaty asmāt param avahitā somya sīmantinīnāṃ kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanataḥ saṃgamāt kiṃ cid ūnaḥ // KMdV_97 //
GK19kmeghvpu:194: tām āyuṣmān mama ca vacanād ātmanā copakartuṃ brūyād evaṃ tava sahacaro rāmagiryāśramasthaḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:195: avyāpannaḥ kuśalam abale pṛcchati tvāṃ viyuktaḥ pūrvāśāsyaṃ sulabhavipadāṃ prāṇinām etad eva // KMdV_98 //
GK19kmeghvpu:196: aṅgenāṅgaṃ tanu ca tanunā gāḍhataptena taptaṃ sāsreṇāsradravam aviratotkaṇṭham utkaṇṭhitena /
GK19kmeghvpu:197: uṣṇocchvāsaṃ samadhikatarocchvāsinā dūravartī saṃkalpais te viśati vidhinā vairiṇā ruddhamārgaḥ // KMdV_99 //
GK19kmeghvpu:198: śabdākhyeyaṃ yad api kila te yaḥ sakhīnāṃ purastāt karṇe lolaḥ kathayitum abhūd ānanasparśalobhāt /
GK19kmeghvpu:199: so 'tikrāntaḥ śravaṇaviṣayaṃ locanānām agamyas tvām utkaṇṭhāviracitapadaṃ manmukhenedam āha // KMdV_100 //
GK19kmeghvpu:200: śyāmāsv aṅgaṃ cakitahariṇaprekṣite dṛṣṭipātaṃ gaṇḍacchāyāṃ śaśini śikhināṃ varhabhāreṣu keśān /
GK19kmeghvpu:201: utpaśyāmi pratanuṣu nadīvīciṣu bhrūvilāsān hantaikasthaṃ kva cid api na te bhīru sādṛśyam asti // KMdV_101 //
GK19kmeghvpu:202: tvām ālikhya praṇayakupitāṃ dhāturāgaiḥ śilāyām ātmānaṃ te caraṇapatitaṃ yāvad icchāmi kartum /
GK19kmeghvpu:203: asrais tāvan muhur upacitair dṛṣṭir ālipyate me krūras tasminn api na sahate saṃgamaṃ nau kṛtāntaḥ // KMdV_102 //
GK19kmeghvpu:204: mām ākāśapraṇihitabhujaṃ nirdayāśleṣahetor labdhāyās te katham api sati svapnasaṃdarśaneṣu /
GK19kmeghvpu:205: paśyantīnāṃ na khalu bahuśo na sthalīdevatānāṃ muktāsthūlās tarukisalayeṣv asruleśāḥ patanti // KMdV_103 //
GK19kmeghvpu:206: bhittvā sadyaḥ kisalayapuṭān devadārudrumāṇāṃ ye tatkṣīrasrutisurabhayo dakṣiṇena pravṛttāḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:207: āliṅgyante guṇavati mayā te tuṣārādrivātāḥ pūrvaspṛṣṭaṃ yadi kila bhaved aṅgam ebhis taveti // KMdV_104 //
GK19kmeghvpu:208: saṃkṣipyeran kṣaṇa iva kathaṃ dīrghayāmās triyāmāḥ sarvāvasthāsv ahar api kathaṃ mandamandātapaṃ syāt /
GK19kmeghvpu:209: itthaṃ cetaś caṭulanayane durlabhaprārthanaṃ me gāḍhoṣmābhiḥ kṛtam aśaraṇaṃ tvadviyogavyathābhiḥ // KMdV_105 //
GK19kmeghvpu:210: nanv ātmānaṃ bahu vigaṇayann ātmanā nāvalambe tat kalyāṇi tvam api sutarāṃ mā gamaḥ kātaratvam /
GK19kmeghvpu:211: kasyātyantaṃ sukham upanataṃ duḥkham ekāntato vā nīcair gacchaty upari ca daśā cakranemikrameṇa // KMdV_106 //
GK19kmeghvpu:212: śāpānto me bhujagaśayanād utthite śārṅgapāṇau māsān anyān gamaya caturo locane mīlayitvā /
GK19kmeghvpu:213: paścād āvāṃ virahaguṇitaṃ taṃ tam ātmābhilāṣaṃ nirvekṣyāvaḥ pariṇataśaraccandrikāsu kṣapāsu // KMdV_107 //
GK19kmeghvpu:214: bhūyaś cāha tvam api śayane kaṇṭhalagnā purā me nidrāṃ gatvā kim api rudatī sasvanaṃ viprabuddhā /
GK19kmeghvpu:215: sāntarhāsaṃ kathitam asakṛt pṛcchataś ca tvayā me dṛṣṭaḥ svapne kitava ramayan kām api tvaṃ mayeti // KMdV_108 //
GK19kmeghvpu:216: etasmān māṃ kuśalinam abhijñānadānād viditvā mā kaulīnād asitanayane mayy aviśvāsinī bhūḥ /
GK19kmeghvpu:217: snehān āhuḥ kim api virahahrāsinas te hy abhogād iṣṭe vastuny upacitarasāḥ premarāśībhavanti // KMdV_109 //
GK19kmeghvpu:218: kac cit somya vyavasitam idaṃ bandhukṛtyaṃ tvayā me pratyākhyātuṃ na khalu bhavato dhīratāṃ tarkayāmi /
GK19kmeghvpu:219: niḥśabdo 'pi pradiśasi jalaṃ yācitaś cātakebhyaḥ pratyuktaṃ hi praṇayiṣu satām īpsitārthakriyaiva // KMdV_110 //
GK19kmeghvpu:220: etat kṛtvā priyam anucitaprārthanāvartmano me sauhārdād vā vidhura iti vā mayy anukrośabuddhyā /
GK19kmeghvpu:221: iṣṭān deśān vicara jalada prāvṛṣā saṃbhṛtaśrīr mā bhūd evaṃ kṣaṇam api ca te vidyutā viprayogaḥ // KMdV_111 //
